name: Concerto
description:
You need 2 Controllers to play:

Inputs (based on Xbox gamepads):

- X - Light Attacks
- Y - Medium Attacks
- B - Heavy Attacks
Left Joystick - Moving, crouching and jump
Left Shoulder - Blocking (can CrouchBlock)
Right Shoulder - Dash (can CrouchDash)

Done by: Francisco Gonzalez Calabro, Gabriel Bois, Baptiste François dit Jonchères, Maxime Mathieu and Ronan Allanic
